reviews.review_msg: This voluntary response sample indicates that you run away from scott. The probability of you having a good mental health in this class is 0. DONT WALK RUN!
Simon fraser university please send someone to his classes so you can improve ur stats department pls...

He was very unorganized. He said he would post recorded lectures during our synchronous classes but never did. His quizzes and tests were easy as long as you read the textbook and do the questions. He was very generous with marks and the content was fairly easy. Get ready to teach yourself using the book and asking questions.

Online material is poorly organized (mainly videos as they are from 2013, blurry, choppy, and rambly.) I was doing well despite teaching myself the content, but when I handed in one of the four assignments slightly late my grade dropped by 30% because late assignments are marked zero. He comes across as unaccommodating and never responds to emails.
Required to teach yourself a bunch of stuff outside of class and during summer 2020 was not very accessible out of class. Often ignored emails.
awesome prof! great personality and sense of humor! maintains a positive atmosphere!!!! and he is crystal clear!!!!
